How many people are affected by infantile neuroaxonal dystrophy ?,Infantile neuroaxonal dystrophy is a very rare disorder. Its specific incidence is unknown.,GHR,infantile neuroaxonal dystrophy
What are the genetic changes related to infantile neuroaxonal dystrophy ?,"Mutations in the PLA2G6 gene have been identified in most individuals with infantile neuroaxonal dystrophy. The PLA2G6 gene provides instructions for making a t
